etymology.interpretation: 爸爸(爸爸) (bàba, "dad; father") consists of the repetition of 爸(爸) (bà, "dad"), which is a term of endearment and familiarity. This repetition emphasizes a fond and warm relationship, and is commonly used by children and adults alike to refer to their father.

examples.chinese: 爸爸是家里的英雄(爸爸是家裡的英雄)。
examples.english: Dad is the hero of our family.

examples.chinese: 我尊敬爸爸(我尊敬爸爸)，因为他总是给我温暖(因為他總是給我溫暖)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ zūnjìng bàba, yīnwèi tā zǒng shì gěi wǒ wēnnuǎn。
examples.english: I respect my dad because he always gives me warmth.

examples.chinese: 放学后我回家向爸爸问好(放學後我回家向爸爸問好)，他的笑容令人安心(他的笑容令人安心)。
examples.pinyin: Fàngxué hòu wǒ huíjiā xiàng bàba wènhǎo, tā de xiàoróng lìng rén ānxīn。
examples.english: After school, I go home to greet my dad, and his smile makes me feel at ease.
